name: Psyche (Mythical)
description: This game is one that's important to me as a person- as someone who copes with moderate depression on a daily basis, and as someone who knows how painful it is to see a close friend suffer through the same thing, I decided to make a game exploring what it's like to have to reconcile with your internal sense of self. This is a game about a young adult, staying inside all day, trying to figure things out. Please be aware- there's nothing too explicit or graphic in this game, but it does mention topics and include portrayals of self-harm and suicide, so if you're triggered by such things, then please be careful.
